original: Lange, Henrik, major, Göteborg, f. 27/5/08 i Sthlm av Karl Lange o. Mär-tha Lagercrantz. G. 34 m. Birgitta Cedercrona. Barn: Carin f. 36, Mär-tha 38, Carl-Henrik 42. — Stud:ex. 26, off:ex. v. KSS, kustart :linj., 30, KSHS ak 36, 2-årig stabsk. 39, Gci 34. Res. t. Tyskl. o. Österr. 22, 25, Centr:-amer., Mexico, USA 26-27, Engl. 46. Fänr. v. KA 2 30, undilöjtn. 32, löjtn, 34, kapt. 39, major 44. Reg:adj. 35, adj. h. chef. sederm. insp. f. KA 39-42, 11. chef. f. isydkust. marindistr, 42-43, h. chef. f. Blek. kustart iförsv. 43-44, chef f. II. bat. v. KA 4 fr. 45. Skr.: div. smärre art. i oi. mil. facktidskr. Hobhies: idr., segl, trädg :sköts., modelljärnvägar. RSO 46, GMbg 32, S-kjutM 29.
translated:
Lange, Henrik, Major, Gothenburg, b. 27/5/08 in Stockholm, son of Karl Lange and Märtha Lagercrantz. Married in 1934 to Birgitta Cedercrona. Children: Carin b. 1936, Märtha b. 1938, Carl-Henrik b. 1942. 

Education: Graduated from secondary school in 1926, graduated from officer training at KSS (Royal Swedish Naval Academy) and joined the Coast Artillery in 1930, attended KSHS (Coast Artillery School) academy in 1936, completed a 2-year staff course in 1939, graduated from the General Course of the Infantry in 1934. 

Military Service: Served in Germany and Austria in 1922 and 1925, served in Central America, Mexico, and the USA from 1926-1927, served in England in 1946. Promotions: Ensign at KA 2 in 1930, second lieutenant in 1932, lieutenant in 1934, captain in 1939, major in 1944. Additional positions: Regimental adjutant in 1935, deputy chief adjutant. Later served as inspector for KA (Coast Artillery) from 1939-1942, commander of the southern coastal navy district from 1942-1943, chief of the Blekinge Coast Artillery from 1943-1944, commander of the 2nd battalion at KA 4 from 1945. 

Writings: Various minor articles in military journals. Hobbies: Sports, sailing, gardening, model railroads. Awards: RSO (Royal Order of the Seraphim) in 1946, GMbg in 1932, S-kjutM (Swedish Shooting Military) in 1929.

structured.name: Henrik Lange
